description: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays

essential_properties.name: fieldToSplitOut
essential_properties.description: The name of the input fields to break out into separate items. Separate multiple field names by commas. For binary data, use $binary.

common_operations.name: Concatenate Items
common_operations.description: Combine fields into a list in a single new item

common_operations.name: Limit
common_operations.description: Remove items if there are too many

common_operations.name: Remove Duplicates
common_operations.description: Remove extra items that are similar

common_operations.name: Split Out Items
common_operations.description: Turn a list or values of object's properties inside item(s) into separate items
